<< helpdlg gui module msgbox >>

inserthtml

Insert html in GUI console.

Syntax

inserthtml(html_txt)

Input argument

html_txt

a string: html text

Description

inserthtml inserts html code in GUI console.

Example

inserthtml(markdown(fileread([nelsonroot(),'/CHANGELOG.md'])))

See also

markdown, fileread.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
